description: Retrieves a commitment purchase analysis result based on the AnalysisId.

parameters.name: AnalysisId
parameters.description: The analysis ID that's associated with the commitment purchase analysis.

nested_items.name: EstimatedCompletionTime
nested_items.description: The estimated time for when the analysis will complete.

nested_items.name: AnalysisCompletionTime
nested_items.description: The completion time of the analysis.

nested_items.name: AnalysisStartedTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the analysis.

nested_items.name: AnalysisId
nested_items.description: The analysis ID that's associated with the commitment purchase analysis.

nested_items.name: AnalysisStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the analysis.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code used for the analysis.

nested_items.name: AnalysisDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the analysis.

nested_items.name: SavingsPlansPurchaseAnalysisDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the Savings Plans purchase analysis.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code used for the analysis.

nested_items.name: LookbackPeriodInHours
nested_items.description: The lookback period in hours that's used to generate the analysis.

nested_items.name: CurrentAverageCoverage
nested_items.description: The average value of hourly coverage over the lookback period.

nested_items.name: CurrentAverageHourlyOnDemandSpend
nested_items.description: The average value of hourly On-Demand spend over the lookback period.

nested_items.name: CurrentMaximumHourlyOnDemandSpend
nested_items.description: The highest value of hourly On-Demand spend over the lookback period.

nested_items.name: CurrentMinimumHourlyOnDemandSpend
nested_items.description: The lowest value of hourly On-Demand spend over the lookback period.

nested_items.name: CurrentOnDemandSpend
nested_items.description: The current total On-Demand spend over the lookback period.

nested_items.name: ExistingHourlyCommitment
nested_items.description: The existing hourly commitment for the Savings Plan type.

nested_items.name: HourlyCommitmentToPurchase
nested_items.description: The recommended or custom hourly commitment.

nested_items.name: EstimatedAverageCoverage
nested_items.description: The estimated coverage of the Savings Plan.

nested_items.name: EstimatedAverageUtilization
nested_items.description: The estimated utilization of the Savings Plan.

nested_items.name: EstimatedMonthlySavingsAmount
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings amount based on the Savings Plan.

nested_items.name: EstimatedOnDemandCost
nested_items.description: The remaining On-Demand cost estimated to not be covered by the Savings Plan over the length of the lookback period.

nested_items.name: EstimatedOnDemandCostWithCurrentCommitment
nested_items.description: The estimated On-Demand cost you expect with no additional commitment based on your usage of the selected time period and the Savings Plan you own.

nested_items.name: EstimatedROI
nested_items.description: The estimated return on investment that's based on the Savings Plan and estimated savings. This is calculated as estimatedSavingsAmount/estimatedSPCost*100.

nested_items.name: EstimatedSavingsAmount
nested_items.description: The estimated savings amount that's based on the Savings Plan over the length of the lookback period.

nested_items.name: EstimatedSavingsPercentage
nested_items.description: The estimated savings percentage relative to the total cost over the cost calculation lookback period.

nested_items.name: EstimatedCommitmentCost
nested_items.description: The estimated cost of the Savings Plan over the length of the lookback period.

nested_items.name: LatestUsageTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time of the last hour that went into the analysis.

nested_items.name: UpfrontCost
nested_items.description: The upfront cost of the Savings Plan based on the selected payment option.

nested_items.name: AdditionalMetadata
nested_items.description: Additional metadata that might be applicable to the commitment.

nested_items.name: MetricsOverLookbackPeriod
nested_items.description: The related hourly cost, coverage, and utilization metrics over the lookback period.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The period of time that you want the usage and costs for.

nested_items.name: EstimatedOnDemandCost
nested_items.description: The remaining On-Demand cost estimated to not be covered by the recommended Savings Plan, over the length of the lookback period.

nested_items.name: CurrentCoverage
nested_items.description: The current amount of Savings Plans eligible usage that the Savings Plan covered.

nested_items.name: EstimatedCoverage
nested_items.description: The estimated coverage amount based on the recommended Savings Plan.

nested_items.name: EstimatedNewCommitmentUtilization
nested_items.description: The estimated utilization for the recommended Savings Plan.

nested_items.name: CommitmentPurchaseAnalysisConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for the commitment purchase analysis.

nested_items.name: SavingsPlansPurchaseAnalysisConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for the Savings Plans purchase analysis.

nested_items.name: AccountScope
nested_items.description: The account scope that you want your analysis for.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The account that the analysis is for.

nested_items.name: AnalysisType
nested_items.description: The type of analysis.

nested_items.name: SavingsPlansToAdd
nested_items.description: Savings Plans to include in the analysis.

nested_items.name: PaymentOption
nested_items.description: The payment option for the Savings Plans commitment.

nested_items.name: SavingsPlansType
nested_items.description: The Savings Plans type.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Region associated with the Savings Plans commitment.

nested_items.name: InstanceFamily
nested_items.description: The instance family of the Savings Plans commitment.

nested_items.name: TermInYears
nested_items.description: The term that you want the Savings Plans commitment for.

nested_items.name: SavingsPlansCommitment
nested_items.description: The Savings Plans commitment.

nested_items.name: OfferingId
nested_items.description: The unique ID that's used to distinguish Savings Plans commitments from one another.

nested_items.name: SavingsPlansToExclude
nested_items.description: Savings Plans to exclude from the analysis.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LookBackTimePeriod
nested_items.description: The time period associated with the analysis.

nested_items.name: Start
nested_items.description: The beginning of the time period. The start date is inclusive. For example, if start is 2017-01-01, Amazon Web Services retrieves cost and usage data starting at 2017-01-01 up to the end date. The start date must be equal to or no later than the current date to avoid a validation error.

nested_items.name: End
nested_items.description: The end of the time period. The end date is exclusive. For example, if end is 2017-05-01, Amazon Web Services retrieves cost and usage data from the start date up to, but not including, 2017-05-01.
